text: I have not had the pleasure of playing this game (I know, I should be smacked).  But I do LOVE this music!  Very relaxing and it fits with the general feel of the Persona games.
author: BygPhattyPlus

text: @ShadowMario64 There's many things you could call me, but selfish probably shouldn't be one. As I always say, I take suggestions (and I love those because they sometimes make me remember games I forgot about), not requests. Should I take requests and add them to the list even if I don't like them? That's not the point of my list. If you think I'm being selfish for not taking requests, then please, feel free to find other channels that do. Thanks.
author: SupraDarky

text: @Arc13 They are subseries in the Shin Megami Tensei series. Think Final Fantasy in a sense.
author: ShakinJamacian

text: I need to know, does the series have multiple names, or are Digital Devil Saga, Shin Megami Tensei, and Persona all from the same people? Cause whenever they're referenced to me, it's ALWAYS ALWAYS ALWAYS in the same sentence and strung together like they're the exact same thing, it leaves me baffled, confused, and unsure where to start the series.
